mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address_tbl (userCode, deliveryAddress, detailDeliveryAddress) VALUES (#{userCode}, #{deliveryAddress}, #{detailDeliveryAddress})
INSERT INTO address_tbl (userCode, deliveryAddress, detailDeliveryAddress, addressStatus) VALUES (#{userCode}, #{deliveryAddress}, #{detailDeliveryAddress}, 2)
mapper.update: UPDATE address_tbl SET deliveryAddress = #{deliveryAddress}, detailDeliveryAddress = #{detailDeliveryAddress} WHERE addressCode = #{addressCode}
UPDATE address_tbl SET addressStatus = 0 WHERE addressCode != #{addressCode} AND userCode = #{userCode} AND addressStatus != 2
UPDATE address_tbl SET addressStatus = 1 WHERE addressCode = #{addressCode} AND addressStatus != 2
mapper.select: SELECT addressCode FROM address_tbl WHERE userCode = #{userCode} AND (addressStatus = 1 OR (addressStatus = 2 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM address_tbl WHERE userCode = #{userCode} AND addressStatus = 1)))
select addressCode from address_tbl where userCode = #{userCode} and addressStatus = 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM address_tbl WHERE userCode = #{userCode}
